allow:
Bash(git -C "D:\\Claude\\Thaasbai" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Keep client connected for 30 seconds when tab is inactive

- Add visibility change detection in multiplayer.js
- Send keepalive ping every 5 seconds while tab is hidden
- Stop keepalive after 30 seconds of inactivity
- Add ping_keepalive handler on server

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Claude\\Thaasbai" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor multiplayer module with unified extensible framework

- Add GAME_CONFIGS registry for easy game additions
- Create BaseLobbyManager with generic room management
- Create BaseSyncManager as base for game sync
- DhihaEiSyncManager and DiGuSyncManager extend base
- Add factory functions: createLobby\(\), createSyncManager\(\)
- Add getAvailableGames\(\) to list registered games
- Maintain backward compatibility with legacy class names
- Adding new games: register config + create sync manager

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\Claude\\Thaasbai" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Digu waiting screen socket and animation issues

- Use global Multiplayer module socket when available
- Add inline spinner styles as fallback for animation
- Fix socket reference in matchmaking listeners and emit
- Add better logging for debugging queue events
- Prevent duplicate socket connections

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
